citation.article-title: Characterization of the marine propionate-degrading, sulfate-reducing bacterium Desulfofaba fastidiosa sp. nov. and reclassification of Desulfomusa hansenii as Desulfofaba hansenii comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Desulfofaba Knoblauch et al. 1999
The original description of this genus was provided by Knoblauch et al. (1999).
Additionally, some species are able to produce inclusions of polyhydroxyalkanoates.
The type species is Desulfofaba gelida.
